name: UICollisionBehavior
desc: An object that confers to a specified array of dynamic items the ability to engage in collisions with each other and with the behavior’s specified boundaries.

items.name: func addItem(UIDynamicItem)
items.desc: Adds a dynamic item to the collision behavior’s item array.

items.name: init(items: [UIDynamicItem])
items.desc: Initializes a collision behavior with an array of dynamic items.

items.name: func removeItem(UIDynamicItem)
items.desc: Removes a specific dynamic item from the collision behavior.

items.name: var items: [UIDynamicItem]
items.desc: Returns the set of dynamic items you’ve added to the collision behavior.

items.name: var collisionDelegate: UICollisionBehaviorDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate object that you want to respond to collisions for the collision behavior.

items.name: protocol UICollisionBehaviorDelegate
items.desc: To respond to UIKit dynamic item collisions, configure a custom class to adopt the UICollisionBehaviorDelegate protocol. Then, in a collision behavior (an instance of the UICollisionBehavior class), set the delegate to be an instance of your custom class.

items.name: func addBoundary(withIdentifier: NSCopying, for: UIBezierPath)
items.desc: Adds a collision boundary, specified as a Bezier path, to the collision behavior.

items.name: func addBoundary(withIdentifier: NSCopying, from: CGPoint, to: CGPoint)
items.desc: Adds a collision boundary, specified as a line segment, to the collision behavior.

items.name: var boundaryIdentifiers: [NSCopying]?
items.desc: The set of boundary identifiers that you’ve added to the collision behavior.

items.name: var collisionMode: UICollisionBehavior.Mode
items.desc: The type of edges that participate in collisions for the collision behavior.

items.name: func removeAllBoundaries()
items.desc: Removes all previously-specified collision boundaries from the collision behavior.

items.name: func removeBoundary(withIdentifier: NSCopying)
items.desc: Removes a specific collision boundary from the collision behavior.

items.name: func setTranslatesReferenceBoundsIntoBoundary(with: UIEdgeInsets)
items.desc: Specifies a collision boundary based on the bounds of the animation reference system, with optional insets.

items.name: var translatesReferenceBoundsIntoBoundary: Bool
items.desc: Specifies whether a boundary based on the reference system is active.

items.name: struct UICollisionBehavior.Mode
items.desc: The types of edges that participate in collisions for a collision behavior.
